TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed PngInterlaceOption extends System.Enum

summary.span: Especifica si una imagen con formato Portable Network Graphics (PNG) se entrelaza durante la codificación.

span.span: Specifies whether a Portable Network Graphics (PNG) format image is interlaced during encoding.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Entrelazado se refiere al proceso de mostrar un [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_png](~/includes/tla2sharptla-png-md.md)] marco en dos campos.Interlacing refers to the process of displaying a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_png](~/includes/tla2sharptla-png-md.md)] frame in two fields. Un campo contiene las líneas del marco, incluso mientras el otro campo contiene las líneas impares del marco.One field contains the even lines of the frame, while the other field contains the odd lines of the frame. Cuando el [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_png](~/includes/tla2sharptla-png-md.md)] es ver, se muestran primero las líneas en un campo y, a continuación, se muestran las líneas en el segundo campo.When the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_png](~/includes/tla2sharptla-png-md.md)] is viewed, the lines in one field are displayed first, and then the lines in the second field are displayed. ## Examples En el ejemplo siguiente se muestra cómo usar el propiedad de la clase.The following example demonstrates how to use the property of the class. [!code-cpp[pngbitmapdecoderencoder#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PngBitmapDecoderEncoder/CPP/PngEncoderDecoder.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[pngbitmapdecoderencoder#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PngBitmapDecoderEncoder/CSharp/PngEncoderDecoder.cs#3)] [!code-vb[pngbitmapdecoderencoder#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PngBitmapDecoderEncoder/VB/PngEncoderDecoder.vb#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Media.Imaging.PngInterlaceOption Default = int32(0)

summary.span: determina si se debe entrelazar la imagen.

span.span: The determines whether the image should be interlaced.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Media.Imaging.PngInterlaceOption Off = int32(2)

summary.span: La imagen de mapa de bits resultante no está entrelazada.

span.span: The resulting bitmap image is not interlaced.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Media.Imaging.PngInterlaceOption On = int32(1)

summary.span: La imagen de mapa de bits resultante está entrelazada.

span.span: The resulting bitmap image is interlaced.
